overview: Jack is really busy casting for music videos and now he's landed Digital Playground's super fine contract star, Sophia Santi alongside Selina Draagen, Alyssa Chase, Carli Banks, Marlena, Christina Brooks and Holly Wellin. We don't know what band is going to use the footage on MTV but we guarantee that all the bands are going to use the footage for something! True to Jack's good sense, there's a lot of tease and a lot of action and it's all entertaining! Forget professional... this volume is all about totally fuckable chicks and lube. Go at it! Let The Unwrapping Begin!
title: Jack's Playground 36
